name: Rescue in Space
description:
Rescue in Space is my first project in Unity.

It's a single screen space shooter with a retro style, inspired on the old single screen Atari games.

Please read the "Info" section in the game menu for instruction on how to play.

I'll be grateful for any opinions and criticism about this game.

There is a RIS_Win64.zip file attached to this page, it's a Win64 executable that you can download and run directly on your computer. Just download it and unzip in any folder you want, then play the executable.

Thanks for playing!
